speaker: player
text: There's a bunch of notes strewn about...

speaker: player
text: Seems like the crew made a few plans on how they could handle the repairs after the asteroid collision.

speaker: player
text: This ship's supposed to carry a few hundred people in cryo pods!

speaker: player
text: Then... why did the scanners not pick up any life-signs?

speaker: player
text: I guess they're not calibrated for people in cryosleep...
